page.title: 18Arts & Crafts, Ardington (3)
page.content:
Mr.Michael Eastham trained as a Conservator of Monuments and Sculpture after teaching for several years and he now works as a freelance craftsman restoring and cleaning items from private collections,churches and museums.He works primarily with marble, limestone,sandstone and alabaster.
Ms.Sally Gault is a Master Saddler specialising in made to measure driving harnesses,the best being made in patent leather with solid brass fittings.She will also hand-stitch such items as gloves,purses and handbags.
Mr.John Gault is a precision engineer whose business has grown so much that he now has 5 employees.Recent work has included making keys for old church locks,electrodes for brainscanning and a machine for making road signs.
